subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: For replacement officials like Jeff Sadorus, refereeing N.F.L. games was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, but it came with an unending barrage of criticism.
snippet: For replacement officials like Jeff Sadorus, refereeing N.F.L. games was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, but it came with an unending barrage of criticism.
